wikipedia_page.main: Stephan Dahl  (born 29 September 1971) is a British academic who holds the position of Cátedra Santander at the New University of Lisbon, Faculty of Social and Human Sciences and adjunct associate professor at James Cook University,. Previously, he was senior lecturer at the University of Hull having  previously taught marketing at Middlesex University in London, United Kingdom. He is an advocate of diversity marketing.

response: These theories have been applied to a variety of different communication theories and settings, including general business and management (Fons Trompenaars and Charles Hampden-Turner) and marketing (Marieke de Mooij, Stephan Dahl). There have also been several successful educational projects which concentrate on the practical applications of these theories in cross-cultural situations.
* Stephan Dahl (born 1971), British professor of marketing
* Stephan Dahl (born 1971), British writer and a lecturer
